item.title: 关税动荡消退，工业巨头重新站稳脚跟
item.description: 今年以来，工业企业试图适应美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）不断变化的贸易政策，经历了过山车式的发展，但本季度，企业高管们表示，随着企业有时间适应美国对进口外国商品征收更高的关税，这种困惑可能正在消退。【原文：Industrial companies have been on a roller-coaster this year as they tried to adjust to the shifting trade policies of U.S. President Donald Trump, but this quarter, executives suggested the confusion may be receding as corporations have had time to adjust to higher levies on U.S. imports of foreign goods.】

item.title: 最高法院不会阻止特朗普的关税政策。官员们说，处理它
item.description: 美国工厂设备制造商 OTC 工业技术公司长期以来一直利用低成本国家（先是中国，后是印度）供应零部件，但唐纳德-特朗普总统对众多贸易伙伴征收关税的举措颠覆了首席执行官比尔-卡纳迪（Bill Canady）的供应链数学。【原文：U.S. factory equipment maker OTC Industrial Technologies has long used low-cost countries to supply components - first China and later India - but President Donald Trump's blitz of tariffs on numerous trade partners has upended the supply chain math for CEO Bill Canady.】

item.title: 独家报道：埃克森美孚首席执行官警告欧盟可持续发展法可能会终止欧洲业务
item.description: 埃克森美孚首席执行官达伦-伍兹（Darren Woods）周一告诉路透社记者，如果欧盟不对一项可持续发展法律做出重大修改，这家能源巨头将不可能继续在欧洲开展业务。【原文：ExxonMobil CEO Darren Woods told Reuters on Monday it will be impossible for the energy giant to continue doing business in Europe if the European Union doesn't make significant changes to a sustainability law that threatens to penalize companies with fines of 5% of global revenue.】

item.title: 早间竞标数据停发，私人工作成焦点
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 香港放宽虚拟资产规则，促进交易流动性
item.description: 一位政府官员周一表示，香港将放宽一项规则，促进虚拟资产交易的流动性，以此作为香港成为主要金融科技和数字资产中心的雄心壮志的一部分。【原文：Hong Kong will ease a rule to promote liquidity for virtual assets trading as part of the city's ambition to become a major fintech and digital asset hub, a government official said on Monday.】

item.title: 全球经济 美国关税冲击订单，亚洲工厂步履维艰
item.description: 周一的商业调查显示，由于美国需求疲软和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统征收关税打击了整个亚洲地区的工厂订单，亚洲的大型制造业中心在10月份举步维艰。【原文：Asia's big manufacturing hubs struggled to fire up in October, business surveys showed on Monday, as weak U.S. demand and tariffs under President Donald Trump hit factory orders across the region.】

item.title: 据国家媒体报道，马来西亚总理表示，耗资 1.42 亿美元的磁铁工厂将促进稀土行业的发展
item.description: 据马来西亚国家媒体报道，马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）表示，在彭亨州开发一个价值 6 亿林吉特（1.42 亿美元）的超级磁铁生产设施将加强该国的稀土行业。【原文：Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim said the development of a 600 million ringgit ($142 million) super magnet manufacturing facility in the state of Pahang will strengthen the nation's rare earth sector, state media reported.】

item.title: 私营企业采购经理人指数显示中国 10 月工厂活动扩张放缓
item.description: 周一的一项私营部门调查显示，由于关税焦虑导致新订单和产出减少，10月份中国工厂活动增速放缓。【原文：China's factory activity in October expanded at a slower pace as new orders and output both waned amid tariff anxiety, a private-sector survey showed on Monday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市受人工智能情绪影响上涨，美元接近三个月高点
item.description: 亚洲股市周一上涨，原因是投资者权衡了上周显示人工智能支出巨大的大盘股财报，而美元则在美联储决策者发表鹰派言论后维持在三个月高点附近。【原文：Asian stocks rose on Monday as investors weighed last week's megacap earnings showing significant spending on artificial intelligence, while the dollar held near a three-month high after hawkish comments from Federal Reserve policymakers.】

item.title: 投资者关注美国公布的数据，美元逼近三个月高点
item.description: 美元周一升至近三个月高点，因为投资者在等待本周公布的数据，以衡量美国经济的健康状况，并确定这些数据是否会改变美联储的鹰派立场。【原文：The dollar firmed to a near three-month high on Monday as investors awaited the release of data this week to gauge the health of the U.S. economy and determine whether it could alter the Federal Reserve's hawkish stance.】

item.title: 特朗普称英伟达的 Blackwell AI 芯片不是为 "其他人 "设计的
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周日表示，英伟达（Nvidia）先进的人工智能芯片 Blackwell 将不会提供给 "其他人"。【原文：Nvidia's advanced Blackwell chip for artificial intelligence would not be available to "other people," U.S. President Donald Trump said Sunday.】

item.title: 韩国 10 月份工厂产出收缩，PMI 显示
item.description: 由于华盛顿关税政策给全球前景蒙上阴影，企业保持谨慎，韩国 10 月份的工厂活动在一个月前短暂扩张后出现萎缩。【原文：South Korea's factory activity contracted in October after briefly expanding a month earlier as businesses remained cautious amid a global outlook clouded by Washington's tariff policies.】

item.title: 英国央行本周可能放缓降息周期
item.description: 英国央行周四很可能按兵不动，自去年开始放宽政策以来首次放缓降息步伐，尽管一些分析师现在预计在通胀走软之后英国央行会降息。 通胀 和工资数据疲软后，一些分析师现在预计英国央行将降息。【原文：The Bank of England looks likely to keep interest rates on hold on Thursday, slowing its pace of cuts for the first time since it started to loosen policy last year, although some analysts do now expect a reduction after softer inflation and wage data.】

item.title: 欧佩克+暂停第一季度增产后石油涨幅扩大
item.description: 欧佩克+决定明年第一季度暂不增产，缓解了市场对供应过剩的担忧，油价在周一亚洲早盘攀升。【原文：Oil prices climbed in early Asian trade on Monday after OPEC+ decided to hold off production hikes in the first quarter of next year, easing rising fears of a supply glut.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Optus 公司首席执行官为紧急线路中断道歉，拒绝下台
item.description: 新加坡电信公司（Singapore Telecommunications）旗下的 Optus 首席执行官就与四人死亡有关的紧急号码中断事件向澳大利亚议会道歉，但以需要保持稳定为由拒绝下台。【原文：The CEO of Singapore Telecommunications-owned Optus apologised to Australia's parliament for an emergency number outage that was linked to four deaths but declined to stand down, citing a need for stability.】

item.title: 新西兰央行压力测试发现顶级银行抵御地缘政治风险的能力很强
item.description: 新西兰储备银行周一表示，该行进行的银行偿付能力压力测试发现，新西兰五大银行完全有能力抵御地缘政治风险加剧带来的影响。【原文：A bank solvency stress test conducted by the Reserve Bank of New Zealand found the country's five largest banks are well placed to withstand the impact of heightened geopolitical risks, the central bank said on Monday.】

item.title: 西太平洋银行利润受成本影响下滑，但因信贷质量改善而超出预期
item.description: 澳大利亚西太平洋银行（Westpac）周一公布的年度利润下降了 2%，但超过了分析师的预期，原因是信贷质量好于预期，非利息收入增加，抵消了成本上升和激烈竞争带来的利润压力。【原文：Australia's Westpac reported a 2% fall in annual profit on Monday but beat analyst estimates, as better-than-expected credit quality and stronger non-interest income offset rising costs and margin pressures from intense competition.】

item.title: 贝森特称美国高利率可能导致房地产衰退
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周日表示，由于利率过高，美国经济的部分领域，尤其是住房领域，可能已经陷入衰退，他再次呼吁美联储加快降息步伐。【原文：Parts of the U.S. economy, particularly housing, may already be in recession because of high interest rates, U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said Sunday, repeating his call for the Federal Reserve to accelerate rate cuts.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"同意 12 月小幅提高石油产量，并暂停第一季度的产量增长
item.description: 欧佩克+"组织在一份声明中说，"欧佩克+"组织的八个成员国周日同意将12月份的石油日产量提高13.7万桶，然后在2026年第一季度暂停提高产量。【原文：Eight OPEC+ countries on Sunday agreed to raise oil output in December by 137,000 barrels per day and then to pause the output hikes for the first quarter of 2026, OPEC+ said in a statement.】

item.title: 在法国监督机构投诉后，中国申银万国从市场上撤下儿童仿真性玩偶
item.description: 中国在线零售商 Shein 周日表示，在法国消费者监督机构在其网站上发现儿童性玩偶后，该公司已停止销售这些玩偶。【原文：Chinese online retailer Shein has pulled from sale childlike sex dolls after they were found on its website by the French consumer watchdog, the company said on Sunday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 10 月份房价创两年多来最大涨幅
item.description: Cotality周一发布的数据显示，由于降息和政府政策刺激了购房需求，10月份澳大利亚房价创下两年多来最大涨幅，同时租金也有所上涨。【原文：Australian home prices jumped by the most in more than two years in October as rate cuts and government policies fuelled buyer demand, data from Cotality showed on Monday, while rents also increased.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，土耳其在最近一次西方制裁后购买了更多非俄罗斯石油
item.description: 土耳其最大的炼油厂正在购买更多的非俄罗斯石油，以应对西方对俄罗斯的最新制裁，两位直接了解此事的人士和几位业内人士告诉路透社。【原文：Turkey's largest oil refineries are buying more non-Russian oil in response to the latest Western sanctions on Russia, two people with direct knowledge of the matter and several industry sources told Reuters.】

item.title: Nexperia荷兰总部表示欢迎取消芯片运输封锁的公告
item.description: 荷兰芯片制造商Nexperia BV公司周日表示，欢迎美国和中国政府最近的声明消除了该公司运输芯片的障碍，但拒绝就其中国子公司将加快独立步伐的声明发表评论。【原文：Nexperia BV, the Dutch chipmaker, said on Sunday it welcomed recent statements by the U.S. and Chinese governments removing barriers to the company shipping its chips, but it declined to comment on statements made by its Chinese subsidiary that it will accelerate steps towards becoming independent.】

item.title: 消息人士称欧佩克+将同意再次小幅增加石油产量
item.description: 三位熟悉会谈情况的消息人士称，欧佩克+将于周日就再次小幅提高石油产量目标达成一致，因为由于对供应过剩的担忧加剧，该产油国集团将放缓重新夺回市场份额的计划。【原文：OPEC+ is set to agree on Sunday on another modest increase in oil output targets, three sources familiar with the talks said, as the producers' group moderates plans to regain market share due to rising supply glut fears.】

item.title: 荷兰母公司暂停供应后，Nexperia 中国分公司称 "库存充足
item.description: 荷兰芯片制造商 Nexperia 的中国分公司周日表示，在母公司停止晶圆供应后，该公司已建立了 "充足的成品和在制品库存"，其供应链仍然安全稳定。【原文：Dutch chipmaker Nexperia's China unit said on Sunday that it had established "sufficient inventories of finished goods and work-in-progress" and that its supply chain remained secure and stable after its parent halted wafer supplies.】

item.title: 特朗普和习近平在关税、出口管制和芬太尼问题上达成了哪些共识？
item.description: 白宫周六公布了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普本周与中国国家主席习近平达成的两国贸易战降级协议的细节，其中包括美国降低关税和暂停中国政府对稀土矿物和磁铁的新限制。【原文：The White House on Saturday released details about the agreement that U.S. President Donald Trump reached this week with Chinese President Xi Jinping to de-escalate their countries’ trade war, including U.S. tariff reductions and a pause in Beijing's new restrictions on rare earth minerals and magnets.】

item.title: 飞行员工会给予汉莎航空解决养老金争议的时间，避免可能发生的罢工
item.description: 据路透社周六获得的德国飞行员工会 VC 致其成员的一封信称，该工会将给予汉莎航空更多时间来解决养老金纠纷，从而暂时避免该航空公司可能发生的罢工。【原文：Germany's pilots union VC is giving Lufthansa more time to resolve a pensions dispute, averting a possible strike at the airline for now, according to a union letter to its members obtained by Reuters on Saturday.】

item.title: 巴西 Azul 公司在破产保护程序中与无担保债权人达成协议
item.description: 巴西 Azul 航空公司周六表示，该公司已与无担保债权人达成和解，从而推进了其在 5 月份申请破产保护后的财务重组。【原文：Brazilian airline Azul reached a settlement with unsecured creditors, advancing its financial restructuring after having filed for Chapter 11 protection in May, the firm said on Saturday.】

item.title: 伯克希尔利润增长，现金飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）周六公布，在沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）卸任首席执行官前的最后一份财务报告中，受惠于保险业务承保情况的改善，其季度营业利润增长了 34%。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway on Saturday reported a 34% increase in quarterly operating profit, helped by improved underwriting in its insurance operations, in its last financial report before Warren Buffett bows out as chief executive.】

item.title: 荷兰、Nexperia 拒绝就 Nexperia 将恢复发货的报道发表评论
item.description: 荷兰政府和 Nexperia 公司周六拒绝就白宫计划宣布恢复荷兰芯片制造商 Nexperia 中国工厂发货的媒体报道发表评论。【原文：The Dutch government and Nexperia on Saturday declined to comment on media reports that the White House plans to announce a resumption of shipments from Dutch chipmaker Nexperia's Chinese facilities.】
